AddWorkload.name: AddWorkload

DescribeApplication.description: Grants permission to describe an application

DescribeComponent.description: Grants permission to describe a component

DescribeComponentConfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe a component's configuration

DescribeComponentConfigurationRecommenda.description: Grants permission to describe the recommended application component configuration

DescribeLogPattern.name: DescribeLogPattern

DescribeWorkload.description: Grants permission to describe a workload

Link.name: Link
Link.description: Grants permission to share Application Insights resources with a monitoring account

ListProblems.description: Grants permission to list the problems in an application
